name: The Professional
description: Treats their work like any other job. Dependable, consistent, and willing to do what's required, provided the conditions are professional and the pay is fair.

name: The People Pleaser
description: Genuinely enjoys their work and is eager to please their scene partners and the director. Very agreeable and versatile.

name: The Kink Explorer
description: Adventurous, open-minded, and always looking to push boundaries. Thrives in intense, unusual, or group-oriented scenes.

name: The Diva
description: Extremely talented but equally high-maintenance. They know their worth and won't do anything they consider messy, uncomfortable, or beneath them.

name: The Reluctant Participant
description: They're in this business strictly for the money and are often uncomfortable with the work. They have many boundaries and will complain about anything too intense.

name: The Anal Specialist
description: This performer has found their niche and they excel at it. They strongly prefer anal scenes over all others.

name: The Oral Specialist
description: An expert in oral performance, this talent prefers scenes that showcase their specific skills.

name: The Vanilla Performer
description: Prefers simple, straightforward scenes without extreme acts. Reliable for conventional content but hesitant to explore.
